titles: To the supreme authority the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England some considerations about the excise of 4s. 8d. per barrell upon sope, humbly offered by the sope-makers of London, who lately presented their petition to your Honors.
author: Hayes, John.
notes: Signed at end: John Hayes [and 19 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Soap --  Taxation --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
